mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW(REVIEWID, POSTID, GIVEUSERID, TAKEUSERID, GRADE, REVIEWDATE) VALUES(ADD_ID('REVIEW', 'REVIEWID', 'RV'),#{postId}, #{hostId},#{userId}, #{grade}, SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO REVIEW_SUB(ID, REVIEWID, BADGEPOINTID, CONTENTS) VALUES(REVIEW_SUB_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{reviewId},#{badgeId}, #{contents})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT E.POSTID ,E.REVIEWID, E.USERID,U.NICKNAME AS USERNAME ,U.BADGEPOINTNAME AS USERURL, E.TAKEURL, E.GRADE, E.BADGEPOINTID, P.BADGEPOINTNAME, E.GIVEUSERID AS HOST, E.CONTENTS FROM END_REVIEW_VIEW E, USER_REPRESENTATION_BADGE U, POINT P WHERE U.USERID = E.USERID AND P.BADGEPOINTID = E.BADGEPOINTID ) WHERE UPPER(USERID) = UPPER(#{userId}) AND POSTID = '${postId}'
